categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: "Flight of the Jedi" was a two-part adventure article in the 19th and 20th issues of Valkyrie role-playing magazine. It was written by Phil Sidebotham and introduced Lilith, a Jedi trainee who betrayed the Jedi Order when, during the Purge, she changed sides to the Galactic Empire and hunted down Purge survivors.
